StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetOrgHierarchy]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@OrgID integer AS
Declare @OrgType varchar(3)
Set @OrgType = (SELECT ORGANIZATION_TYPE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID)
-- Only Region, District, and RS orgs return data. IF @OrgType IS NULL OR @OrgType NOT IN ('R', 'D', 'RS') BEGIN SELECT 0 AS Region, 0 AS District, 0 AS RS END -- Region org returns NULLs for District and RS ELSE IF @OrgType = 'R' BEGIN SELECT @OrgID AS Region, 0 AS District, 0 AS RS END -- District Org returns NULL for RS and parent Region ELSE IF @OrgType = 'D' BEGIN SELECT PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID AS Region, @OrgID AS District, 0 AS RS FROM ORGANIZATION_MAP WHERE CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID END -- RS Org returns parent (2 levels up) Region and parent District ELSE IF @OrgType = 'RS' BEGIN SELECT OM2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID AS Region, OM1.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID AS District, @OrgID AS RS FROM ORGANIZATION_MAP OM1 INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM2 ON (OM1.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND OM1.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = OM2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID) END
